summary: i18n migration for Visits/Authorizations module tested successfully. All translations working correctly in both Spanish and English. Language switching via Profile page works bidirectionally. Tab navigation, authorization form dialog, history filters, and all visitor/authorization types display correct translations.
critical_code_review_comments: ResidentVisitsModule.jsx correctly uses useTranslation with t('visitors.tabs.*') keys
VisitorAuthorizationsResident.jsx properly implements getAuthorizationTypes(t), getVisitorTypes(t), getDaysOfWeek(t) functions that accept translation function
ResidentVisitHistory.jsx correctly uses getVisitorTypes(t), getStatusConfig(t), getFilterPeriods(t) for translated config
All translation keys under 'visitors' namespace in es.json and en.json are properly structured and complete
LanguageSelector component has proper data-testid attributes for testing (language-btn-es, language-btn-en)
context_for_next_testing_agent: i18n migration for Visits module complete and verified. All components (ResidentVisitsModule, VisitorAuthorizationsResident, ResidentVisitHistory) properly use useTranslation hook. Static config objects converted to functions accepting 't' parameter. Language switching works via Profile page with LanguageSelector component. Both Spanish and English translations verified working. Expected console errors: GPS GeolocationPositionError (headless browser), 403 resource errors (non-blocking).

tab_navigation_spanish.details: Tabs show 'Visitas' and 'Historial' in Spanish (t('visitors.tabs.authorizationsShort'), t('visitors.tabs.history'))

form_dialog_spanish.details: Dialog shows 'Nueva Autorización', 'Tipo de Persona', 'Nombre del Visitante', 'Tipo de Autorización', 'Fecha Desde/Hasta', 'Notas (opcional)', 'Cancelar', 'Crear Autorización'

form_dialog_english.details: Dialog shows 'New Authorization', 'Person Type', 'Visitor Name', 'Authorization Type', 'Date From/To', 'Notes (optional)', 'Cancel', 'Create Authorization'

history_component_spanish.details: Shows 'Historial', '0 visitas • 0 adentro', 'Últimos 7 días', 'No hay visitas registradas', 'Las visitas aparecerán aquí'

history_component_english.details: Shows 'History', '0 visits • 0 inside', 'Last 7 days', 'No visits recorded', 'Visits will appear here'

language_switch_spanish_to_english.details: Clicking 'English' button in Profile updates all UI text immediately

language_switch_english_to_spanish.details: Clicking 'Español' button in Profile updates all UI text immediately
